AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID - iam generated access key id
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY - iam generated access key 
AWS_INSTANCE_ID - Ec2 instance id usually start with an 'i'
AWS_REGION - aws set region of your instance

HOST_NAME - public ipv4 dns address of your instance
SSH_PRIVATE_KEY - ssh private key generated for your instance
USER_NAME - your instance private name usually 'ubuntu' if it is an ubuntu based instance

DOCKER_HUB_ACCESS_TOKEN - generated docker hub token
DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME - dockerhub user name
